QuestData.Title: Rift Recon
QuestData.Description:
Devourers are a problem. Rifts are a bigger problem.
They will keep bringing devourers. We must close them. To do this, we need information.
Take the crescendal. Use it to analyze the rifts. Bring the information back to us.
QuestData.RewardText: This information will help us. Tell us how to close the rifts. Fewer rifts means fewer devourers.
